comments:
Karla, please assign to Samson.  Thanks

This is a bug found by Sheldon.  Must fix for 4.2i4.
Copying from Sheldon's description:

Steps to Reproduce:
  Run the testcase in the following scenario: 
  - RAC is started on the target host, security enabled 
  (1) Open the Profiling and Logging perspective.  Create a profiling luanch 
configuration for HelloWorld by selecting Run>Profile...
  (2) Right click the "Java Applicaiton" and create a new entry.
  (3) Specify the HelloWorld class in the "Main class" entry
  (4) Select the "Monitor" tab and check the "Agent Descoverer" check box.
  (5) Click the "Profile" button
  >Verify that a Security Message dialog is displayed requiring a user name and 
password since this is a secure connection and password authentication is 
required.  
  (6) Click 'Cancel' on the Security Message dialog.
  >Verify that another Security Message dialog is displayed stating the 
connection failed on the host (e.g. localhost) since this is a secure 
connection and password authentication is required.  
  (7) Click 'OK' on the Security Message dialog.  
  (8) Click 'Finish' on the Launch Java Process dialog.  
  >Verify that another Security Message dialog is displayed requiring a user 
name and password since this is a secure connection and password authentication 
is required.  
  (9) Click 'OK' on the Security Message dialog.
  >Verify that another Security Message dialog is displayed stating the data 
was invalid since the user name is incorrect.  
  (10) Click 'OK' on the Security Message dialog.
  (11) Click 'Cancel' twice to get out of the dialog box
  (12) Run steps  1 to 8 again with the correct user id and password.

Actual Results:
Sometimes I get the following null pointer exception.  This happens 
intermittenly but quite reproducable.  There are times when I can run the 
program without putting a passwrd.

java.lang.NullPointerException
  at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.security.UserFactory.getUser
(UserFactory.java:92)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.ConnectUtil.getUserDialog
(ConnectUtil.java:508)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.ConnectUtil.getUserDialog
(ConnectUtil.java:466)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.ConnectUtil.authenticateUser
(ConnectUtil.java:529)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.ConnectUtil.secureConnect
(ConnectUtil.java:422)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.ConnectUtil.connect
(ConnectUtil.java:211)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.ConnectUtil.connect
(ConnectUtil.java:440)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.internal.util.PDCoreUtil.profileConnect
(PDCoreUtil.java:1204)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.internal.util.PDCoreUtil.profileConnect
(PDCoreUtil.java:1216)
  at 
org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.provisional.launcher.AbstractProcessLauncher.createNod
e(AbstractProcessLauncher.java:247)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.provisional.launcher.PrimaryLaunchDelegate.run
(PrimaryLaunchDelegate.java:272)
  at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
